summary: **Call of Duty** is a popular video game series about military combat. It started in 2003 and has many games set in different times, like World War II and modern times. The games are made by several companies and have sold over 425 million copies. The series is one of the best-selling and most successful in the world, with lots of fans playing every month. There are also other products like toys and a movie in the works.
title: Call of Duty
